Installing¶

Dependencies¶

The only dependency for fuzzycomp is python 2.4 - 2.7. No additional packages needs to be installed.

Install¶

Using pip replacing X Y Z for the version number that you want to install:

pip install http://fuzzycomp.googlecode.com/files/fuzzycomp-X.Y.Z.tar.gz

Or by downloading and unpacking the desired version and from the consol executing:

python setup.py install

Testing¶

Fuzzycomp comes with a complete test suite included in the package. To run the test suite, do the following:

$ cd fuzzycomp/tests
$ python test_fuzzycomp.py

And you should see something like this:

Running tests
Running tests2
...............................................................................
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Ran 79 tests in 0.096s

OK
